entry.title: Friday night: Chance of rain showers or flurries. Low minus 6. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers early this evening then 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High zero.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. High zero. Wind chill minus 13 in the morning. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 7 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 8 in the evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Friday 7 April 2023
